column3: I've updated the code to take @luke-jr's suggestions into account\n
Why socket_base instead of boost::asio::ip::tcp::acceptor (as in current code)?\n
Any reason not to bind _after_ setting reuse_address (like boost itself does)?\n
yes that would be more logical order\n
boost itself uses socket_base::reuse_address internally, but that's fine with me too\n
